post:
Hello dear LET people, 

After many fails  in auto provisioning module today we have the pleasure to announce about this was resolved thanks to @MikePT , so we will offer a huge discount in our kvm storage line.

About ticketing : normally we respond now in less than 24-48 hours and we will keep to cut this time because in the past 80% of the tickets was related to module issue so we hope this time we will be back to normal .

Now ... where is the offer ? we have decided to include all period payments so the disccount will be in this way : 

1) montly payments 10%  Recurring for life using cupon code kvm10%
2) Quarently payments 20%  Recurring for life using cupon code kvm20%
3) 6 month payments 30% Recurring for life using cupon code kvm30%
4) 1 year payments 40% Recurring for life using cupon code kvm40%
5) 2 years payments 50% Recurring for life using cupon code kvm50%

6) any period time 1-2-3 years 60% ONE TIME PAYMENT using the cupon code kvm60%

Exemple of kvm offer : 

**1TB HDD
CPU 1vCore
1 Dedicated IP
1GB ECC RAM
Full Root Access
Multiple 32/64 bit OS
10TB Traffic/Month
1 Gbps Port**

https://secure.hostsolutions.ro/cart.php?a=add&pid=402&currency=1&language=en
Price after apply the cupon code for exemple kvm60%  will be 29.60 eur/year

**2TB HDD
CPU 2vCore
1 Dedicated IP
2GB ECC RAM
Full Root Access
Multiple 32/64 bit OS
15TB Traffic/Month
1 Gbps Port**

https://secure.hostsolutions.ro/cart.php?a=add&pid=403&currency=1&language=en
Price after apply the cupon code for exemple kvm60%  will be €57.60EUR /year


You can play with any plan up to 10tb/kvm or use any cupon code what is fit your needs in any plan from this adress : https://hostsolutions.ro/eng/hosting/kvm-storage .


We offer 30 money back guarantee (no question asked) if you dont make more than 100gb traffic .

Ping ip 45.14.148.1

ALL cupons is valid until the day 31.10.2019 or when we collect orders up to 800 tb space.

Also we will deliver the first 100 orders in 4-5 hours after this we can tard up to 48-72 hours in provide your kvm , due date for delivery will be Sunday (12.10.2019)


Thanks all .
